TopicTitle: Rate That User Title (With a detailed reason)

Articles.Content:
You know how Red Iron Crown has the user title, "Plight Director"? Well, I want us to rate eachother's user titles.

Before we start, here are the basic rules:

1. Use some sentences to explain why you chose that rating.

2. Ratings are on a scale of 1 to 10.

3. Tell your forum friends about this game so they can join in!

4. You MUST rate the title of the poster above you.

Let's begin.

0/10

Because I'm the first poster.

I can't provide a detailed reason because I'm the first poster.

EDIT:

Requirement for the explanation reduced from 5 sentences to a detailed reason at the request of Starwhip.

Edited September 17, 2014 by Sun

Look, not to be rude, but two things:

A) Nobody who comes to the Forum Games really wants to do an English assignment, and

This game has already kind of been made.

Cut it to just the user title, and then it would be better.

Ok, at your request, I have changed the rules.

Back on track, 1/10 because dragons are boring.
Guys, we can't let this thread die as soon as it's born.
0/10 cause *we know* the truth.
0/10 because pony's wouldn't make good president's.
2/7, a bit generic.

7/10

Fairly original as I have seen.
9/10. Monolith proportions.
9/10 for pun of a standard user title.
6/10 So you're from Scotland or Ireland.

2/10

i care about your location

3/10. Pretty generic.

(I totally didn't notice that Sun mentioned me by name in the OP. *Blush*)

5/10

Average rating because I don't know what it means exactly.

6/10 So you're from Scotland or Ireland.

USA, actually. Atomic Lass is a slight Homestuck reference, just like the rest of my existence forum presence.
In that case, 0/10 because I have no clue what HS is, much less want to care about it.

Thanks.

6/10 to Megalodon 720 for at least somewhat sensical user title.
OK, new rule: rate the user title of the poster above you.
4/10 - a bit untrustworthy. But then again, it may be only me - I question everything.

3/7, fairly standard.

(also, if sun can repeatedly post muddy boots or whatever it is, I can rate out of 7, right?)
1.75/2 - It's great.

0.89/1 - Really works well with the steampunk-looking rocket and airship-suggestive name to give the impression of some mustachioed gung-ho Victorian explorer. Maybe the guy from Up, or someone from the Airborn trilogy?

1/10

IDK since I just got home from school

drum hole/dum roll

because it's needless to details the mud dummies as a sun java & oracle sum dum ; is it ?

Edited September 17, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
This has been edited 3+ 1 times ;)

7/10

Original but redundant since you're on this forum.
